damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

lore: Rocketing through the skies on billowing trails of flame and smoke, Dakkajets come in low and hard over the battlefield. These single-seater Ork attack craft are ludicrously over-gunned for their size, all but shaking themselves apart as their pilots unleash storms of dakka on luckless ground targets or enemy aircraft with equal glee.

otherAbilities.Dakkastorm:: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, every successful Hit roll scores a Critical Hit .
